Current Position
Job Title: Business Analyst
Job Description: Analyze and perform optimization for understanding and leveraging the claims adjudication process and system to implement & lead collaborative efforts for creating and enhancing complex healthcare processes using Center for Medicare & Medicaid Services (CMS) measures. Perform proof of concept (POC) to analyze and improve complex processes using tools like Microsoft Visio, PowerPoint, & Excel. Perform requirements gathering, interview SMEâ€™s. Conduct data analysis. Perform extensive data analysis for optimizing processing system, ensuring optimal turn-around time and processing time. Provide solutions for unique benefits.
Job Location: Will work in West Fargo, ND and various unanticipated locations throughout the US as assigned, which may require relocation.
Contact: Interested applicants may send their resumes to Fargo Solutions Inc, 623 Main Ave, Ste 102B, West Fargo, ND 58078, USA. Attn: HR. Resume must specifically identify all education & experience relevant to job offered.

Endless Opportunities

Continued Engagement

People drive our business, and we believe that our growth is a derivative of our employees. Whether you are engaged with us on a contract or direct placement; our support staff is there to assist you from onboarding till the completion. We recognize your value and we commit to providing our employees the same level of support we provide to our clients
